synopsis.text:
Amamiya Hibiya's monotonous summer days take a turn for the extraordinary when he encounters Hiyori Asahina, setting off a chain of events that intertwine their fates. This forms the crux of "Kagerou Daze," one of the five captivating music videos in the Mekakucity Days series.

Mekakucity Days is a collection of official music videos, featuring the wildly popular Vocaloid songs by Jin (Shizen no Teki-P), and brought to life by the talented illustrators Sidu and Wannyanpu. The series is primarily sung by virtual singers IA and Hatsune Miku.

The music videos included in the series are:
1. Kagerou Daze (カゲロウデイズ) - originally released on the web on September 30, 2011.
2. Headphone Actor (ヘッドフォンアクター) - originally released on the web on December 15, 2011.
3. Kuusou Forest (空想フォレスト) - originally released on the web on February 1, 2012.
4. Konoha no Sekai Jijou (コノハの世界事情) - originally released on the web on March 30, 2012.
5. Toumei Answer (透明アンサー) - an exclusive music video only available on the Mekakucity Days DVD release.

Each music video tells a unique story, delving into the lives of various members of the Mekakushi-dan. From Takane Enomoto's desperate search for salvation amidst apocalyptic chaos in "Headphone Actor," to Mari Kozakura'
